question: Legal Service Day is celebrated all over India on which date?
explanation: Legal Service Day is celebrated on 9th November. It was first started by the Supreme Court in the year 1995 all across India to offer help and support to the weaker and poor group of sections of people. The aim of celebrating Legal Services Day is to offer free of charge, proficient, and legal services to the people of weaker sections of society. The day celebration is organized all over India to increase awareness of free legal aid towards every weak citizen of the country.
